items.title: Version 1.0.4 Build 1 live on Web — iOS review pending
items.summary: The fully up-to-date app (1.0.4 Build 1) is now available on Web. iOS version 1.0.3 Build 2 remains under review. Subscriptions are managed through Apple and Google Play and carry over to Web.
items.body:
As of March 1, 2026, the fully up-to-date version of Infinitum Creator Ledger (Version 1.0.4 Build 1) is now live and fully usable on the Web platform.

The iOS version (1.0.3 Build 2) remains under App Store review after being submitted Thursday. We are actively awaiting approval and are prepared to push Version 1.0.4 Build 1 to production on iOS as soon as review is completed.

If you would like immediate access to all the newest features, UI updates, and performance improvements, please use the Web version here:

https://infinitum-creator-ledger.web.app/boot

All subscriptions are handled directly through the Apple App Store and Google Play Store. Subscriptions must be started and managed within those platforms. Once active, your subscription status automatically carries over to the Web version when you log in with the same account.

We appreciate your patience as we finalize the App Store review process and continue rolling out updates across all platforms.

items.title: Federal tax support added — update pending App Store approval
items.summary: We’ve pushed an update adding federal tax handling. Some users may need to re-check or re-enter tax settings. Awaiting App Store approval.
items.body:
At 6:30 PM EST on February 26, 2026, we pushed an update that adds federal tax support inside Infinitum Creator Ledger.

As part of this release, some existing users may notice that certain tax settings have reset to defaults. If that applies to you, please review your tax configuration and re-enter any necessary values to ensure accurate calculations.

We are currently waiting on App Store approval before this update becomes publicly available. Once approved, the update will roll out automatically.

Thank you for your patience as we continue improving tax accuracy and compliance features.

items.title: Agency financial & performance tracking in testing
items.summary: Agency tools for tracking business earnings, expenses, and monthly network performance are now in testing. Production release coming soon.
items.body:
As of February 26, 2026, Agency and Creator Network features have entered active testing.

These tools are built specifically for agency owners and creator networks to:

• Track agency-level earnings and operational business expenses in one structured system.
• Monitor overall network performance across months in a clearer, more organized way than existing platform-provided tools.
• View trends and performance changes over time without relying on manual spreadsheets or fragmented reporting.

This is focused on giving agencies better financial clarity and long-term performance visibility.

We are currently validating calculation accuracy, reporting consistency, and monthly aggregation logic before moving these features into full production.

If you operate an agency or creator network, streamlined business financial tracking and improved monthly performance monitoring is coming soon.

items.title: Milestone rewards: limited promo codes for active subscribers
items.summary: At each major milestone, 1,000 promo codes will be randomly distributed to actively subscribed users. At 100K users, 100 annual codes will be randomly awarded.
items.body:
We’re celebrating growth with real rewards — but with updated rules.

At 1,000, 5,000, 10,000, 20,000, and 50,000 users, we will release 1,000 promo codes per milestone. These codes will be randomly distributed to actively subscribed users at the time the milestone is reached.

At 100,000 users, 100 annual promo codes will be randomly awarded to actively subscribed users.

Promo codes are not first-come, first-served and are not guaranteed. Users must have an active paid subscription at the time of distribution to qualify.

Winners will be selected randomly from eligible subscribers and notified in-app once a milestone is achieved.

items.title: Infinitum Creator Ledger publicly launched out of beta
items.summary: Infinitum Creator Ledger is now publicly available after beta testing. Track LIVEs, earnings, and exports in one place.
items.body:
On February 22, 2026, Infinitum Creator Ledger officially launched to the public after completing its beta phase.

The app is now fully available for creators to track LIVE streams, log earnings, manage expenses, and export data from Export Center for taxes and reporting.

Thank you to all beta users who helped test, provide feedback, and improve the platform prior to public release.

items.title: Infinitum Creator Ledger beta launched
items.summary: The beta version of Infinitum Creator Ledger officially launched for early users.
items.body:
At 9:00 AM EST on February 11, 2025, we officially launched the beta version of Infinitum Creator Ledger.

This initial release allowed early users to begin tracking LIVE streams, logging earnings, organizing expenses, and testing core financial tools prior to public launch.

Feedback from beta users directly contributed to performance improvements, feature refinements, and overall stability leading into the public release.
